sentences.sContent: The closure of the export department resulted in over 100 redundancies.
sentences.sCn: 出口部关闭导致一百多人被解雇。

sentences.sContent: Two thousand workers now face redundancy.
An employee is not eligible for a redundancy payment unless he has been with the company for two years.
sentences.sCn: 在公司工作满两年的雇员才有资格拿遣散费。

synos.tran: [计][数]冗余（等于redundance）；裁员；人浮于事

phrases.pCn: 冗余核对；过剩信息校验

trans.tranOther: a situation in which someone has to leave their job, because they are no longer needed
